scripts.run:android: export JAVA_HOME=/opt/android-studio/jbr && export ANDROID_HOME="$HOME/Android/Sdk" && export NDK_HOME="$ANDROID_HOME/ndk/$(ls -1 $ANDROID_HOME/ndk)" && bun tauri android dev --open --host
scripts.build:android: export JAVA_HOME=$(readlink -f /usr/bin/java | sed "s:bin/java::") && export ANDROID_HOME="$HOME/Android/Sdk" && export NDK_HOME="$ANDROID_HOME/ndk/$(ls -1 $ANDROID_HOME/ndk)" && bun tauri android build --apk
